message: To remove yourself from the chat for this play session, type "/irc part #playtppi". You can rejoin in the EiraIRC options.
Rules: Avoid swearing - No ETA requests - No modlist requests - Don't advertise - Use common sense.
Open the chat and press tab to talk with us!
Remember %user%, breaking the rules can get you timed out or banned!
Press T and then the "Options" button in the top right. It may be under your minimap!
